mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (name, email, phone, username, password, created_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{username}, #{password}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, email, phone, username, password, created_at FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT id, name, email, phone, username, password, created_at FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT id, name, email, phone, username, password, created_at FROM users WHERE phone = #{phone}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM users WHERE phone = #{phone}
